mdRecord.dcterms:title: Certificate of Commission to Calohill M. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Certificate of commission to Calohill M. Stigleman as Captain in the 130th Regiment of the Twenty-sixth Brigade and Fifth Division of the Virginia Militia 28th day of April, 1860 - signed by Governor of the Commonwealth John Letcher. 1 original piece front and back and 1 photocopy.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
